snippet.title: Hamster Survival Free Prologue Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 FREE PROLOGUE WILL BE AVAILABLE ON:
https://koder123456.itch.io/hamstersurvival

📑🇺🇸 Game Description:

Hamster Survival is a post-apocalyptic survival game in which the player takes on the role of a hamster and must survive in harsh conditions. In the game you will have to fight monsters, build bases and craft items. The game has an interesting soundtrack and we think it will appeal to many players.

📰Additional Information:

 🎵We also have Tiktok. You are welcome!
https://www.tiktok.com/@hamstersurvivalgame

🎶Music:

Cinematic Epic Emotional | EGLAIR by Alex-Productions | https://onsound.eu/
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
